title: Snowball Games Are NOT Fun
body:
I wish I could have really long games that truly rely on skill and allows everyone to get to full build instead of having a {{champion:222}} get one item and become OP.

I just feel like the game is not fun when you can't get to late game, and the new herald does not help either...

Lets not forget about {{champion:18}} being able to speed up the game even more with her bombs.

There is always that rare game though, that 40 minute game that restores my faith in league because those games are AMAZING.

Maybe I just need a break :/

replies.body: I first thought you meant poro king and nu-aram and I came to agree with you
